author: Home Repair Tutor
description:
This video shares drywall patching secrets for beginners. 

For the written tutorial and more tips visit https://homerepairtutor.com/how-to-patch-drywall/

#drywall #drywallrepair #homerepairtutor   

Drywall Patching Secrets for Beginners
0:14 How to remove old toilet paper holder
0:38 How to cut drywall patch
1:04 How to add drywall blocking
1:35 How to add drywall patch
1:56 How to use joint compound
3:45 How to prime and patch drywall patch 

These supplies were used in our video:

-Level 5 joint compound knives
-Easy Sand 45 setting type joint compound 
-Coarse threaded drywall screws (1-5/8 inch)
-KILZ 2 primer
-Purdy White Dove rollers

Some product links may be Amazon affiliate links. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases at no additional cost to you. 

Want our newest DIY videos? Subscribe to our channel and hit the notification bell to see every upload. We upload new videos every Saturday.

title: Drywall Patching Secrets for Beginners

author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower electrical tips…I installed an LED niche in this shower and needed to drill holes through the studs. I used @greatstufffoam Fireblock foam because it impedes the spread of fire and smoke through those penetrations. Also I like the Smart Dispenser because it allows me to use the Fireblock for up to 30 days - many thanks to Great Stuff for partnering with me and making products that keep homeowners safe 🔥#greatstufffoam #electricaltips #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: Shower Electrical Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor #GreatStuffFoam #brandpartner
